snippet.title: Runbow Launch Overview Trailer- Available now!
snippet.description: Are you Ready? Runbow, the first 9-player game on the Wii U eShop, is out now! The world changes with each swipe of the background colour so you have to think fast to stay on top! Race against friends in Run, go head to head in Arena and King of the Hill, or take on the malicious ColourMaster in our competitive modes. Defeat Satura in the single player Adventure or put your skills to the ultimate test in the Bowhemoth! Then head online to play Run, Arena, and King of the Hill with players from all over the world! With tons of unlockable content and a boat load of Indie Guest Characters, there's so much to do you'll be running back for more. It's fast, it's frantic, and it's out now! Get Ready to Runbow!
